title: Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht: Deck Saloon", ca. 1934–35
description: Plan and elevations for deck saloon of Lady Esther Yacht. Double-door at center of west wall. Bookshelf on left side of north wall, chair in front. Five-seat sofa along remainer of north wall, lighting behind sofa. Capehart radio-phonograph to right of sofa on east wall with panel on front for radio control; record storage to right of capehart, and bar and speaker at end of unit with curved corner. Doorway at lower right corner of east wall. Winding staircase at center of south wall with wood baluster and lighting in top; three tubular metal rails. Three-seat sofa to left of stairs; lighting behind sofa.
